'''Don Quijano''' is a quest-exclusive [[NPC]] that appears in {{Quest|Free Verse}}.

==Profile==
Quijano is friends with [[Penny]] and [[Nana]]. He is a swashbuckler wanted by the [[Maison Gardiennage]]. He used to adventure with his pals [[Rouge]] and [[Freeman]]. Three hired hitmen chased them to [[Poisson]], but Quijano saved the day and drove the goons away.<ref>{{Ref/Quest|Free Verse}}</ref>

===Appearance===
Don Quijano is a [[Tiger-Striped Cat]] with a black hat and a white feather attached to it. He also has a small musketeer-like sword strapped by his side.

==Trivia==
* Don Quijano is a reference to the protagonist Alonso Quijano or Don Quixote of the Spanish epic novel ''{{w|Don Quixote|El ingenioso hidalgo don Quixote de la Mancha}}'' by {{w|Miguel de Cervantes}}.
* Don Quijano's appearance may be a reference to {{w|Puss in Boots (Shrek)|Puss in Boots}} from the Shrek franchise, being an orange cat, having a hat with a feather, and having a Spanish name.
